title: If you could describe Jimin using only one picture, what would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only one??? Oh jeez ok… If I had to choose ONE, it would probably be this:  Have any of you ever heard of Destiny Blue? Well she’s the artist who made this beautiful picture as well as many others. Her art often has psychological meanings, and they represent deep things. So this photo depicts someone surrounded by hurtful, degrading words that people are using to describe her. Despite this, she peacefully paints the word that truly describes her on the brick she holds. Beautiful. I think this photo represents Jimin very well. He has been called so many terrible things by people he didn’t even know. Sometimes he let it get to his head, which caused him to hurt himself. He began to believe the cruel words of others. Those words started to become his own. However, in the end, he is able to accept himself for who he is and ignore the voices of those who don’t truly know him. Jimin knows by now that he is not what those evil words say. The brick that he holds is the only one that belongs inside of him, because it is the only one that truly describes him. He is beautiful. Inside and out. This picture is a beautiful representation of him accepting that. 💜 ~Laura ☮️

This solo dance performance of “I Need You” on 2019 MMA sums up everything that makes Jimin such a captivating BTS member! He is very expressive when he dances, synchronising his body to convey the music. He conveys lightness in dancing like a bird in flight that is simply breathtaking to watch! No-one rocks a solo dance performance like Jimin.💜  Here’s Jimin thanking everyone for enjoying his performance!💜Have a great week ahead!🌞 Credits/Source. The images/GIF are not mine. Thank you Google Images.
